name: Gateway to Hell
overview: Walking through a construction site, you fall into an abandoned well, ending up in a castle forgotten. Buried, with the passage of time, underground. Now you have to find the exit of the castle before the available time runs out. Watch out! The door is clogged by a cloud of dust that you must destroy in order to get out. The castle has three sections. You have to find the dungeon tunnel to enter the second section. From there you have to find the third section, where the exit is located. Will he find the way out or will it be his personal door to hell?
